name: Galactic Hijack
description:
The year is 21XX. Humanity is locked in an intergalactic war with a vicious alien species seeking human destruction. In all this bloodshed and mayhem, you will rise up... to capitalize on chaos and make as much cash as possible.

Controls

Use WASD to move, Space to shoot. If a ship is damaged enough, it can be stolen, as indicated by the flashing "STEAL" icon above it.

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 161!

Primary Programmer:  Sentient_Cactus

Secondary Progammer/Artist:  MinisculeMinute
